name: InteractivePhysio01
0:
”Alexa open my interactive buddy”
”Alexa start my interactive buddy”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my interactive buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Skill provides a fitness routine and a helpful advice on balancing exercises and nutrition. 
The exercise routine is created through a web interface and then it is delivered through a browser on a computer or an Alexa-enabled device. The routine includes audio, images and videos. The content is optimized for Echo Show devices with a rectangular screen: Show 5, Echo Show 8, Echo Show 10, etc.
The skill facilitates access to the program trial by Deakin University. The purpose of the project is to develop a virtual personal trainer that would guide daily sessions after a qualified professional would have created a workout program based on individual goals, whether it be strength, flexibility, balance or general fitness. Participation in the trial is by invitation only. For additional inquiries, contact us by email: paul.jansons@deakin.edu.au or phone: (+61) 3 9251 0750
Disclaimer 1 : "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number".
Disclaimer 2 : "Consult a healthcare professional or government guidelines should you have additional concerns about allergies, dietary restrictions or food safety and handling."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
